morphInfos.tenseExplained: it happens (Aorist Imperative does not indicating any tense)
morphInfos.voiceExplained: it is something one does (the same as Active)
morphInfos.moodExplained: saying that an action should or must happen
morphInfos.personExplained: they are the ones being spoken or written to
morphInfos.numberExplained: there are two or more of them
morphInfos.explanation: an action that certainly should or must happen - by persons being spoken or written to
